text: niyata vasayenma numbata pratigna dennan vanahi ovuhu pratigna denuye allahtaya. allahge ata ovunge at valata ihalini. eheyin kavareku (pratignava) kada kale da niyata vasayenma ese ovun pratignava kada karanuye tamanta erehivaya. tavada kavara deyak veta taman allahta pratigna dunne da eya itu kala vita ohu mahat vu tilinayak ohuta pirinamanu Ã¦ta
